product_name: CamelBak Pursuit 24 LR Hydration Pack - 100 fl. oz.
long_description: The CamelBak Pursuit 24 LR Hydration Pack is light and stable for done-in-a-day adventures. Its lumbar reservoir transfers weight to the waist, lowers your center of gravity and maximizes comfort. SV(TM) back panel features suspended open mesh and delivers maximum ventilation and comfort, all while offering easy reservoir loading. Features include a large overflow pocket, side stretch pockets, a load-bearing waist belt with cargo pocket, sunglasses pocket, 4-point compression and tool attachments. 100-oz./3-liter Antidote(TM) lumbar reservoir features the Quick Link system for quick refills and a welded center baffle for a low profile. The CamelBak Pursuit 24 LR Hydration Pack features an extra-wide port on the reservoir that makes it easy to fill and clean; quarter-turn cap is a snap to open. Reservoir is taste-free; Big Bite(TM) valve is ergonomically positioned for easy drinking.
